Title: Authorizes the spouses of certain volunteer firefighters to be issued a distinctive license plate for volunteer firefighters
Summary: Authorizes the spouses of certain volunteer firefighters to be issued a distinctive license plate for volunteer firefighters.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the spouses of certain volunteer firefighters to be issued a distinctive license plate for volunteer firefighters
